The nanoStack documentation

0.6

Introduction

This is the main document for the nanoStack implementation.

Common code modules

The Common directory contains code that is shared among the full range of architectures. The directory contains the main protocol stack functionality and the protocol modules.

Platform modules and libraries

The Platform directory contains the platform specific support libraries and drivers. These are called by the protocol stack modules and by the application itself.

Installation

untar the bundled source package. Use "tar" on Linux, for example WinZip or cygwin "tar" on Windows.
